abil_studious.name: Studious
abil_studious.desc: At character creation, start with 1 level in one studied trait.

abil_apathy.name: Apathy
abil_apathy.desc: -1 penalty to non-combat checks with people who are not companions, family, or close allies. -1 penalty on Despair checks when the character has recently been mocked or failed at a task.
